mapper.select: select * from product where shop_id in ( select shop_id from shop where shop_id in ( select shop_id from member where loc_code in ( select loc_code from location where loc_name like '%' || #{locName} || '%' ) ))
select * from product where product_id like '%' || #{productName} || '%'

select pd.*, i.product_img_no, i.product_img_origin, i.product_img_renamed, i.product_id from ( select ps.*, m.profile_renamed from ( select s.shop_visit_count,s.shop_total_score, s.member_id, p.* from shop s join product p on s.shop_id = p.shop_id where product_id = '20210521013107' ) ps join member m on ps.member_id = m.member_id ) pd left join product_image i on pd.product_id = i.product_id

select loc_name from ( select loc_code from ( select * from product p join shop s on s.shop_id = p.shop_id where product_id = '20210521013107' ) ps join member m on ps.member_id = m.member_id ) a join location l on l.loc_code = a.loc_code
